jdbcService.sql: select * from ~tasks t join ~task_queues tq on t.task_queue_id = tq.id where (:correlationId is null or t.correlation_id = :correlationId) and (:groupId is null or t.group_id = :groupId) and (:contextId is null or t.context_id = :contextId) and (:task is null or t.task = :task) and (:queue is null or tq.name = :queue) and (:queueId is null or tq.id = :queueId)
